participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Creative and determined, with a passion for helping others through her art.
participant_1.background: I enjoy color correcting my makeup looks for my colorblind viewers. I drive a large, blue van. I love the rain. I am a chef. I can also squat 400 pounds.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: A bit introspective and not always open about his feelings, but deeply passionate about music and personal growth.
participant_2.background: I love listening to punk music to help me cope with the stress of my life. I am not honest about my relationship with my girlfriend. I have a brand new car to match my new mansion. Sometimes I wish I did not have to wake up in the morning. I get to wear my favorite color, purple, every day.

content.text: Hey! I'm really into color correcting for my colorblind viewers.
That's actually really cool! I don't know a whole lot about color blindness so I'd love to learn more.
Yeah, it's actually a really interesting subject! I've learned a lot about it since I started making makeup tutorials for my channel.
I'm impressed that you're able to do so much with your makeup despite being colorblind!
Thanks! It's definitely a challenge, but I'm learning more and more all the time.
I'm sure you're going to be an amazing makeup artist!
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I love all kinds of music, but I especially love punk music.
That's awesome! I love punk music too! It's so energetic and fun.
I wish I could play an instrument.
You should totally learn! It's so much fun!
I know! I've been thinking about it for a while. Maybe I'll start taking lessons soon.
That would be awesome! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
